preview. üê∏

Mailgun ( http://www.mailgun.com )

Example of an email with image asset.

You should upload your email images to a CDN, or for
smaller file sizes you can also inline them.

Should come in handy for branded transactional emails or
promotional type emails.

Follow @leemunroe ( http://twitter.com/leemunroe ) on
Twitter.
